mapper.select: SELECT RES_CD, RS.ROOM_CD, USER_CD, RES_STDT, RES_EDDT, RES_RSN, R.ROOM_CD, BLD_CD, ROOM_PUR, ROOM_CAP, ROOM_TEL, COMD_CD, COM_CD, COMD_NM, COMD_DESC FROM RESERVATION RS, ROOM R, COMMON_DETAIL CD WHERE RS.USER_CD = #{userCd} AND R.BLD_CD = CD.COMD_CD AND RS.ROOM_CD = R.ROOM_CD ORDER BY RS.RES_STDT DESC

SELECT RES_CD, RS.ROOM_CD, RS.USER_CD, RES_STDT, RES_EDDT, RES_RSN, U.USER_CD, FILE_CD, USER_NM, USER_NME, USER_TEL, USER_ZIP, USER_ADDR1, USER_ADDR2, USER_REG1, USER_REG2, USER_MAIL, USER_PASS, USER_BANK, USER_DEPO, USER_ACC, U.COMD_CD, R.ROOM_CD, R.BLD_CD, ROOM_PUR, ROOM_CAP, ROOM_TEL, CD.COMD_CD, COM_CD, COMD_NM, COMD_DESC FROM RESERVATION RS, USERS U, ROOM R, COMMON_DETAIL CD WHERE RS.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd} AND RS.USER_CD = U.USER_CD AND RS.ROOM_CD = R.ROOM_CD AND R.BLD_CD = CD.COMD_CD
mapper.insert:
SELECT RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RES_CD, ROOM_CD, USER_CD, RES_STDT, RES_EDDT, RES_RSN) VALUES (#{resCd}, #{roomCd}, #{userCd}, #{resStdt}, #{resEddt}, #{resRsn})
mapper.select: SELECT RES_CD, RS.ROOM_CD, RS.USER_CD, RES_STDT, RES_EDDT, RES_RSN, U.USER_CD, FILE_CD, USER_NM, USER_NME, USER_TEL, USER_ZIP, USER_ADDR1, USER_ADDR2, USER_REG1, USER_REG2, USER_MAIL, USER_PASS, USER_BANK, USER_DEPO, USER_ACC, U.COMD_CD, R.ROOM_CD, R.BLD_CD, ROOM_PUR, ROOM_CAP, ROOM_TEL, CD.COMD_CD, COM_CD, COMD_NM, COMD_DESC, B.BLD_CD, COL_CD, BLD_ZIP, BLD_ADDR1, BLD_ADDR2 FROM RESERVATION RS, USERS U, ROOM R, COMMON_DETAIL CD, BUILDING B WHERE RS.USER_CD = U.USER_CD AND RS.ROOM_CD = R.ROOM_CD AND R.BLD_CD = CD.COMD_CD AND B.BLD_CD = R.BLD_CD AND RS.RES_CD = #{resCd}
